title: Suspects all
creator_credit: Anthony Pelissier, Ronald H. Riley, Film Producers Guild and R.H.R. Productions
brief_description: A dramatised fatal factory fire and its investigation shows how such accidents can result from carelessness, fire hazards such as litter, poor building design, overloaded electrical circuits and lack of fire drill for the staff.
creator_credit_for_label: Anthony Pelissier, Ronald H. Riley, Film Producers Guild and R.H.R. Productions
